USERID_HEADER_KEY.description: the header key to get the user id

USER_PROPERTIES_HEADER_KEY.description: the header key to get the user permissions

GROUPS_HEADER_KEY.description: the header key to get the groups comma separated list

CLIENTTYPE_HEADER_KEY.description: the header key to get the client type

BACKOFFICE_HEADER_KEY.description: the header key to get if the request is from backoffice (any truly string is true!!!)

MICROSERVICE_GATEWAY_SERVICE_NAME.description: the service name of the microservice gateway

ADDITIONAL_HEADERS_TO_PROXY.description: comma separated list of additional headers to proxy

ENABLE_HTTP_CLIENT_METRICS.description: flag to enable the httpClient metrics
